headline: Ask HN: Writing tools like CoPilot but for prose?
description:
So GitHub CoPilot is all the rage these days. Sure there are annoying rough edges but there’s no denying it’s useful. (I won’t wade into the licensing issues here).

I’m a bit surprised similar tools for writing normal prose haven’t become popular, or maybe I just missed hearing about them.

Are there any similar (cheap/free) tools for writing normal prose?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 像CoPilot那样的写作工具，但用于散文？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 像CoPilot那樣的寫作工具，但用於散文？
description_zh-Hans:
最近，GitHub CoPilot风靡一时。当然，它有令人讨厌的粗糙边缘，但不可否认的是它很有用。(

我有点惊讶，类似的编写普通散文的工具还没有流行起来，也许我只是错过了它们的消息。
description_zh-Hant:
最近，GitHub CoPilot風靡一時。當然，它有令人討厭的粗糙邊緣，但不可否認的是它很有用。(

我有點驚訝，類似的編寫普通散文的工具還沒有流行起來，也許我只是錯過了它們的消息。
